_metadata.purpose: Golden test data for TASK-104 plain text colon prefix verification
notes: Tests plain text format with 'Speaker:' colon prefix pattern
Multi-line utterances joined with single space
No timestamps available (null for start_ms and end_ms)

segments.speaker: Interviewer
segments.text: Good morning. Thank you for coming in today.
segments.raw_text: Interviewer: Good morning. Thank you for coming in today.

segments.speaker: Candidate
segments.text: Thank you for having me. I'm excited about this opportunity.
segments.raw_text: Candidate: Thank you for having me. I'm excited about this opportunity.

segments.speaker: Interviewer
segments.text: Let's start with your background. Can you tell me about your experience?
segments.raw_text: Interviewer: Let's start with your background. Can you tell me about your experience?

segments.speaker: Candidate
segments.text: Of course. I've been working as a software engineer for five years. I started at a startup where I learned full-stack development. Then I moved to a larger company to focus on backend systems.
segments.raw_text:
Candidate: Of course. I've been working as a software engineer for five years.
I started at a startup where I learned full-stack development.
Then I moved to a larger company to focus on backend systems.

segments.speaker: Interviewer
segments.text: That sounds like a good progression. What technologies do you work with?
segments.raw_text: Interviewer: That sounds like a good progression. What technologies do you work with?

segments.speaker: Candidate
segments.text: Primarily Python and Go for backend services. I also have experience with Kubernetes and cloud infrastructure.
segments.raw_text:
Candidate: Primarily Python and Go for backend services.
I also have experience with Kubernetes and cloud infrastructure.

segments.speaker: Interviewer
segments.text: Excellent. We use similar technologies here.
segments.raw_text: Interviewer: Excellent. We use similar technologies here.

segments.speaker: Candidate
segments.text: That's great to hear. I noticed from your job posting that you're working on distributed systems.
segments.raw_text: Candidate: That's great to hear. I noticed from your job posting that you're working on distributed systems.

segments.speaker: Interviewer
segments.text: Yes, that's correct. It's a key area we're investing in.
